body.name: O’Bright Portable LED Table Lamp with Touch Sensor, 3-Levels Brightness, Rechargeable Battery Up to 48 Hours Usage, Night Light for Kids Nursery, Nightstand Lamp, Bedside Lamp (Gold)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 51 mins
features: Portable - The LED night lamp is battery-powered. It is equipped with a 1500 mAh rechargeable battery allowing up to 48 hours usage. You may connect the lamp to wall outlet all the time as a regular bedside night lamp. You may disconnect it as needed and carry the portable lamp during the night for extra safety. Or, bring it to outdoor camping as a spare light.

Dimmable - The nightstand lamp is built-in a touch sensor dimmer with 3-levels of brightness which make it easy for you to change the brightness by tapping the lamp. The lowest setting generates a gentle light for better sleeping. Its highest setting provides extra brightness for comfort reading or nursery purpose without disturbing your sleeping partners or babies.

Universal USB Charging - The rechargeable light comes with an USB adapter for charging. Even if you lost or forgot to bring its adapter, you can still charge the lamp by connecting the cable to any USB ports, including laptops, computers, power banks, wall outlets, or power strips.

A Nice Addition To Home - This novelty lamp has a sleek and low-profile design which adds a mood light to embellish your home or office without taking too much space. With its built-in battery, you can place the light to anywhere, your nightstand, shelves, desk, side table, dining table and so much more…..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: O'Bright Portable LED Table Lamp Illuminate your space anytime, anywhere with O’Bright Portable LED Night Lamp ! Equipped with a rechargeable battery, it provides up to 48 hours of cordless lighting. The advanced LED generates soft and warm light (3000K) to create a comfortable environment for better sleep. Dimmable touch sensor allows you to adjust the brightness to fit your needs with a simple tap. Low-profile and sleek design fits in small places and brings an elegant embellishment to your home decoration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for dining room table
reviews.reviewText: We went to one of our new favorite Italian restaurants in Miami FL, Coppola's Bistro. They had these lights on each table with the overhead lights off. It looks great and with the adjustable lights, you can set to a low mode for dining and mid to high range to read the menu. My wife had me take a photo of the brand and lamp type because she loved the simplicity of these. We ordered two for our dining room table. They work better the LED candles. These lamps have a long battery life as well. They are very sturdy, but light enough to move and carry around. We have a complete smart home, but these are great for manual setting when we sit down to eat at the dining room table. They will also be great when we have a power outage since they are easy to carry around and have a long battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, sleek and elegant !
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp - it's so portable and low profile! Once charged, it works for quite a while without being plugged in so it's easy to move around. Very lightweight. It has multiple light settings that are touch activated which is such a convenient feature (no fiddling around to find a button). However, even on the brightest setting it is still low lighting. I use it to journal but it's been used to light am intinate dinner table as well. I traveled on the road for months and brought this with me! It's a sleek retro design and looks more expensive than it is. I love it and have repurchased as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my personal study corner that is without an electrical outlet. Love that I don't need to change batteries. I know when it's finished charging because the red light shuts off. I didn't expect it to light up the entire room. However it adds enough light where I'm sitting when I set it on a little table in front of me. I feel it is worth the price. It feels it sturdy enough and could look good anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute simple lamp
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something cute and simple for the corner of the kitchen counter. It's a unique design and provides a soft light when needed vs turning on the brighter bigger kitchen lights. The only con I have is the battery lasts only a few days even when it is not in use. It doesn't bother me much. Its next to a plug so I can charge it easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME AND CONVENIENT, PRACTICAL AND VERY USEFUL
reviews.reviewText: We purchased one of these a few months ago, and never got around to opening it. We finally did, and love it so much, that we just bought two more. The lamp easily recharges, and a charge is supposedly good for 48 hours. (We haven't timed it). They're small and attractive and provide a lot of light for a small lamp. You just have to tap it to turn it on and off, and between on and off, there are three levels of brightness.I've got one by my computer, so it's perfect at night when I don't want to put on the overhead lights or use a bigger lamp. We purchased one for the kitchen table as an emergency light source since it is hurricane season, and sometimes we lose power during inclement weather.You can't go wrong with this purchase. We purchase two in the chrome (silver) color and one black one. We highly recommend them.PS if you lose electrical power you could easily charge them with any independent charger that is capable of charging your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting power charge
reviews.reviewText: I use this light mainly as a night light in our house. One round of charge keeps forever and I love the several brightness settings making this a super versatile lamp for a variety of uses.The weight gives it stability and adds a certain value to it while still being super portable to carry around wherever needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Introducing the "Very Cool Lamp for I'm Working in the Dark" - an innovative lighting solution designed to enhance your productivity and create a pleasant working atmosphere even in low-light conditions.This lamp is specifically crafted for individuals who often find themselves needing to work during nighttime or in areas with minimal natural lighting. With its sleek and modern design, it effortlessly integrates into any workspace, be it a home office, studio, or even a bedside table.Built with quality and durability in mind, this lamp is made from high-grade materials that ensure its longevity. It is also portable and lightweight, making it convenient to carry around wherever your work takes you. Whether you're a student pulling an all-nighter, a creative professional seeking inspiration, or an avid reader who loves immersing themselves in a good book, this lamp is your reliable companion even in the darkest hours.Illuminate your workspace and elevate your productivity with the "Very Cool Lamp for I'm Working in the Dark." Experience unparalleled functionality, style, and comfort all in one compact and remarkable lighting solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a beautiful, portable, modern table light
reviews.reviewText: I got it in the afternoon and immediately opened it to try it out. It came with a simple box and well packaged. Once I opened it I thought the light is too warm yellow and not warm white, but once it's dark, I realized it is indeed warm white light and it is very nice for light reading at night. Battery seems to last at least 2 nights without charging. I use it about 3-4 hours per night.I will recommend and will buy again if needed!
La batería dura poco pero está muy bonita.

I ordered this for my grandmother as a way to touch a light on her side table where there is no easy plug and without a complex switch. It is nice-looking, easy to charge, and also durable in case it were ever knocked down in the dark. Perfect purchase!
Esperaba menos por el costo pero es hermosa y alumbra más de lo esperado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vino con una falla de armado
reviews.reviewText: Vino con una falla de ensamble pero nada difícil de arreglar por uno mismoEl puerto de carga estaba desfasado a su lugarSolo es abrir la base y acomodarloFunciona genial
